qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Ashland City Hospital and Southport General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, Q. Gomez or K. Mendoza?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: Q. Gomez was admitted on April 9th, and K. Mendoza was admitted on June 20th. Q. Gomez was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Ashland City Hospital and Southport General Hospital, what were the pulse rates of Q. Gomez and K. Mendoza during their physical examinations?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: Q. Gomez's pulse rate was 78 bpm, while K. Mendoza's pulse rate was 76 bpm. Q. Gomez's pulse rate was slightly higher than K. Mendoza's.
